verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"If one <S%H5254>ventures<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> with you, will you <S%H3811>become<s%> <S%H3811>impatient<s%>? But <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H6113>refrain<s%> from <S%H4405>speaking<s%>?
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> you have <S%H3256>admonished<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> And you have <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H7504>weak<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
"Your <S%H4405>words<s%> have helped the <S%H3782>tottering<s%> to <S%H6965>stand,<s%> And you have <S%H553>strengthened<s%> <S%H3766>feeble<s%> <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
"But <S%H6258>now<s%> it has <S%H935>come<s%> to you, and you are <S%H3811>impatient;<s%> It <S%H5060>touches<s%> you, and you are <S%H926>dismayed.<s%>
"Is not your <S%H3374>fear<s%> [of God] your <S%H3690>confidence,<s%> And the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of your <S%H1870>ways<s%> your <S%H8615>hope<s%>?
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> [ever] perished being <S%H6>innocent<s%>? Or <S%H9345>where<s%> were the <S%H375>upright<s%> <S%H3477>destroyed<s%>?
"According to <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> those who <S%H9177>plow<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> And those who <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> <S%H7114>harvest<s%> it.
"By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> they perish, And by the <S%H6>blast<s%> of His <S%H7307>anger<s%> they <S%H639>come<s%> to an <S%H3615>end.<s%>

"The <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of the <S%H9030>lion<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the [fierce] <S%H7826>lion,<s%> And the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> are <S%H5421>broken.<s%>
"The <S%H3918>lion<s%> perishes for <S%H6>lack<s%> of <S%H1097>prey,<s%> And the <S%H2964>whelps<s%> of the <S%H1121>lioness<s%> are <S%H3833>scattered.<s%>
"Now a <S%H1697>word<s%> was <S%H1589>brought<s%> to me <S%H1589>stealthily,<s%> And my <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> a <S%H8102>whisper<s%> of it.
"Amid <S%H9620>disquieting<s%> <S%H9620>thoughts<s%> from the <S%H2384>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> When <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H376>men,<s%>
<S%H6343>Dread<s%> <S%H7122>came<s%> upon me, and <S%H9564>trembling,<s%> And made <S%H7230>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6342>shake.<s%>
"Then a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H2498>passed<s%> by my <S%H6440>face;<s%> The <S%H8185>hair<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5568>bristled<s%> up.

"It <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> but I could not <S%H5234>discern<s%> its <S%H4758>appearance;<s%> A <S%H8544>form<s%> [was] <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> [There was] <S%H1827>silence,<s%> then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a voice: <S%H6963><s%>
'Can <S%H582>mankind<s%> be <S%H6663>just<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>? Can a <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H2891>pure<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>?
'He <S%H539>puts<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> <S%H2005>even<s%> in His <S%H5650>servants;<s%> And against His <S%H4397>angels<s%> He <S%H7760>charges<s%> <S%H8417>error.<s%>

<S%H637>'How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H637>more<s%> those who <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay,<s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H3247>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> Who are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6211>moth!<s%>
<S%H4480>'Between<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%> they are <S%H3807>broken<s%> in <S%H3807>pieces;<s%> <S%H1097>Unobserved,<s%> <S%H7760><s%> they perish <S%H6>forever.<s%>
'Is not their tent-cord <S%H5265>plucked<s%> up within them? They <S%H4191>die,<s%> yet <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>'
